title: Dont forget our great Special $250 OFF!!!
posting_body: Use this link for more details:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1259 Sq.
Welcome home to the comfort that you've been craving at Colton Creek Apartments in McDonough, GA.
Here, you'll discover the living space that you've been waiting for.
With the ideal combination of personal, and community amenities, you'll have everything that you need to enhance your daily routine.
At our McDonough apartments, you can stay active at our lighted tennis court, or work up a sweat by increasing your reps at the 24-hour fitness center.
Relax, and rejuvenate at our resort-style pool, and embrace pure bliss at the hydro spa.
Our thriving community in McDonough, GA offers you everything that you need to always feel right at home.
You'll love being conveniently located on Avalon Parkway just moments away from local restaurants, hot spots, and downtown.
Come home to Colton Creek, and experience better living today.
- Carpet throughout living room and bedroom
- Wood-style flooring in kitchens and bathrooms
- Free Wi-Fi access available in common areas
- Clothes Care center with washers and dryers
- Hub by Amazon: package lockers with 24/7 access
